page.title: 07ROADS/TRANSPORT IN BACK
page.content: {SINGLE TRACK ROADS With the exception of the B895,which is dual track, all the roads in the area are single track with passing places. Some of the more densely populated areas have street lights and a pavement. There are no traffic lights or pedestrian crossings. {BUS SERVICES There are 5 bus services to and from Stornoway each day.The adult single fare from Back to Stornoway is 50p. {VEHICLE DENSITY There are 160 private cars, 17 vans, 15 lorries, 13 buses, 11 motorbikes, 30 bicycles and 25 tractors in the area.{ {TRAFFIC CENSUS On a normal day a total of 98 vehicles pass through the area on the B895 during the morning rush-hour.
